claim: A video of Covid-19 patients in a Thai field hospital after a coronavirus outbreak in the Thai province of Samut Sakhon in December 2020.
label: FALSE

claim: Two thirds of Covid deaths and 77% of the official Covid cases in Germany are without verification of the presence of the virus, the are just suspected cases, a report from hospitals shows
label: Mostly false

claim: 10 children in Vienna were hospitalized for fungal infections caused by wearing masks.
label: FALSE

claim: In a video, Dr. Qiao Gui-Bin of Guangdong General Hospital recommended drinking tea and washing hands with tea since tea can kill coronavirus.
label: FALSE

claim: A television report about violence breaking out at a US hospital after patients were vaccinated against the novel coronavirus.
label: FALSE

claim: The Swiss Minister of Health has visited a hospital where mannequins are being held
label: Partially false

claim: Hospitals are empty, so there is no pandemic.
label: MISLEADING

claim: COVID-19 patients only die in hospitals; none die at home.
label: FALSE

claim: Social media users speak of conspiracy because of photos of Swiss Health Minister Alain Berset supposedly visiting Mannequins at the Neuchâtel Hospital
label: FALSE

claim: Hospitals in Asahikawa have each accepted 40 Chinese COVID-19 patients.
label: FALSE

claim: If masks work, then let family back into hospitals and nursing homes to be with their loved ones. If they don’t work, get them off our children. Someone is lying…
label: Partially false

claim: Guilherme Boulos, who ran for mayor in São Paulo and is a pro-public health activist, was admitted to the Albert Einstein Hospital, one of the most expensive private hospitals in the country, after contracting COVID-19
label: FALSE

claim: A patient in a COVID-19 hospital wing was able to talk live to a news broadcast which proves that the pandemic is a scam. These patients are supposed to always be intubated so he should not be able to talk to anyone.
label: MISLEADING

claim: A photograph shows how a dead man is taken out of the hospital with only two fingers, showing that the pandemic is a farce
label: Partially false

claim: A video shows an emply Covid ward in a hospital in Ludwigsburg
label: FALSE
